name: Dungeon Traps
description:
Dungeon Traps is an adventure game that happended on a old times warrior or explorer. Use your skills to pass levels, collect coins and finally fighting with a Minotaur boss monster and so on. This game have very realistic graphics and will be a pleasure to play it.

How to play:
- touch or hold screen icon to move, jump, crouch and combat
